body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Lawrence Gonzalez and the customer's name is Marie Kelly.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Roofing Service ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Lawrence Gonzalez, and I'm with MetaCar, your trusted roofing service.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Marie! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Well, I have some concerns about my roof.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, and I'm here to help. Could you please provide me with your address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three Elm Street.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Marie. And may I also have your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's four five six, seven eight nine, zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate that. We want to ensure everything is taken care of properly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help, Lawrence.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome, Marie! Thank you for your time, and have a great day!
